newsitem.title: USA: N.Y. metal futures opening forecasts.
newsitem.headline: N.Y. metal futures opening forecasts.

text.p: New York metals futures were called to open by traders as follows:
COMEX August gold - unchanged to up $0.50 an ounce
COMEX Sept silver - unchanged to down 0.50 cent
COMEX Sept copper - unchanged to up 0.30 a lb
